content.value: My 9 different single - type teams which entered hall of fame .
Eak neuf hefferentatta zengleat - type teomta which interin doll af faji .
This page contains all the moves I have used .
Thisat paci conqoens ollatta tdiatta jaita E doi yziin .
This page contains all the pokemons I have used .
Thisat paci conqoens ollatta tdiatta lanijanta E doi yziin .
My grass type team contains only one pokemon : Lilligant .
My Lilligant ♀ is a grass type pokemon . She is lv.91 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Sleep Powder , Dream Eater , Quiver Dance and Petal Dance .
Grass Type , no power , 75 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Sleep Powder puts target to sleep .

Psychic Type , 100 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Dream Eater only works if the target is asleep , inflicts damage and up to 50 % of the damage dealt to the target is restored to the user as HP . If this attack deals 1 HP of damage , 1 HP will restored to the user .
Bug Type , no power , no accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Quiver Dance raises the user's Sp.Att , Sp.Def and Spd by one stage each .
Grass Type , 120 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Petal Dance inflicts damage for 2 ~ 3 turns . After finishing , the user becomes confused .
Eak grass type teom conqoens anlyat un lanijan : Lilligant .
Eak Lilligant ♀ bes un grass type lanijan . Diat bes leil 91 wdin intereng foll af faji . ond diatak jaeta beit Sleip Lawder , Dreom Iotir , Queir Dance ond Peqol Dance .
Grass Type , no lawer , 75 occuragu ond 15 LL ( ma 24 ) . Sleip Lawder puts qorcit qa sleip .

Psychic Type , 100 lawer , 100 occuragu ond 15 LL ( ma 24 ) . Dreom Iotir anly works ef tdiut qorcit bes osleip , enflicts damaci ond yp qa 50 % af tdiat damaci deolin qa tdiut qorcit bes resqarein qa tdiut yziir os HL . Ef thisat otqock deols 1 HL af damaci , 1 HL will resqarein qa tdiut yziir .
Bug Type , no lawer , no occuragu ond 20 LL ( ma 32 ) . Queir Dance raezis tdiut yziirak Sp.Otq , Sp.Def ond Spd fu un sqoci ioch .
Grass Type , 120 lawer , 100 occuragu ond 10 LL ( ma 16 ) . Peqol Dance enflicts damaci bar 2 ~ 3 turnta . ofter fikesheng , tdiut yziir becojis conbyziid .
My water type team contains six pokemons : Simipour , Vaporeon , Lapras , Starmie , Golduck , and Gyarados .
My Simipour ♂ is a water type pokemon . He is lv.74 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Ice Punch , Dig , Shadow Claw and Waterfall .
Ice Type , 75 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Ice punch inflicts damage , and has a 10 % chance of freezing the target .

Ground Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . On the turn that Dig is selected, the user will dig underground and become semi-invulnerable , where the only attacks it cannot avoid are Earthquake , Fissure , Magnitude , and Sonic Boom . The damage inflicted by Earthquake and Magnitude will be doubled . On the following turn, Dig will do damage .
Ghost Type , 70 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Shadow Claw has an increased critical hit ratio .
Water Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Waterfall has a 20 % chance of causing the target to flinch .
My Vaporeon ♂ is a water type pokemon . He is lv.74 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Surf , Ice Beam , Signal Beam and Shadow Ball .

Water Type , 95 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Surf hits all adjacent pokemon , including allies . It can also hit a pokemon during the semi-invulnerable turn of Dive , and the damage will be doubled .
Ice Type , 95 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Ice Beam inflicts damage , and has a 10 % chance of freezing the target .
Bug Type , 75 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Signal Beam has 10 % chance of putting target to confused .
Ghost Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Shadow Ball has 20 % chance of decreasing target's Sp.Def by one stage .
My Lapras ♂ is a water and Ice type pokemon . He is lv.77 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Surf , Thunderbolt , Dragon Pulse and Ice Beam .
Electric Type , 95 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Thunderbolt has 10 % chance of putting target to paralysis .
Dragon Type , 90 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Dragon Pulse has no special effect .
My Starmie is a water and Psychic type pokemon . It is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And its moves are Psychic , Recover , Thunderbolt and Ice Beam .
Psychic Type , 90 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Psychic has 10 % chance of decreasing target's Sp.Def by one stage .
Normal Type , no power , no accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Recover restores half of the user's HP .
My Golduck ♀ is a water type pokemon . She is lv.72 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Surf , Aqua Jet , Amnesia and Psychic .
Water Type , 40 power , 100 accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Aqua Jet has no special effect .
Psychic Type , no power , no accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Amnesia raises the user's Sp.Def by two stages .
My Gyarados ♀ is a water and flying type pokemon . She is lv.70 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Dragon Dance , Waterfall , Dive and Thrash .
Dragon Type , no power , no accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Dragon Dance raises the user's Att and Spd by one stage each .

Water Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . On the turn that Dive is selected, the user will dive underwater and become semi-invulnerable , where the only attacks it cannot avoid are Surf and Whirlpool . The damage inflicted by Surf and Whirlpool will be doubled . On the following turn, Dive will do damage .
Normal Type , 120 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Thrash inflicts damage for 2 ~ 3 turns . After finishing , the user becomes confused .
My normal type team contains six pokemons : Togekiss , Ursaring , Stoutland , Lopunny , Bouffalant , and Cinccino .
My Togekiss ♀ is a normal and flying type pokemon . She is lv.84 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Aura Sphere , Extreme Speed , Heat Wave and Air Slash .
Fighting Type , 90 power , no accuracy , it will always hit the target , and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Aura Sphere has no special effect .
Normal Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . Extreme Speed has no special effect .
Fire Type , 100 power , 90 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Heat Wave has 10 % chance of putting target to burn .
Flying Type , 75 power , 95 accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Air Slash has a 30 % chance of causing the target to flinch .
My Ursaring ♀ is a normal type pokemon . She is lv.75 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Thrash , Earthquake , Shadow Claw and Rock Slide .

Ground Type , 100 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Earthquake hits all adjacent pokemon , including allies . It can also hit a pokemon during the semi-invulnerable turn of Dig , and the damage will be doubled .
Rock Type , 75 power , 90 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Rock Slide has a 30 % chance of causing the target to flinch .
My Stoutland ♀ is a normal type pokemon . She is lv.74 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Superpower , Giga Impact , Dig and Crunch .
Fighting Type , 120 power , 100 accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . Superpower decreases the user's Att and Def by one stage each .
Normal Type , 150 power , 90 accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . Giga Impact forces the user to recharge during the next turn .
Dark Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Crunch has 20 % chance of decreasing target's Def by one stage .
My Lopunny ♂ is a normal type pokemon . He is lv.74 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Fire Punch , Thunder Punch , Ice Punch and Drain Punch .
Fire Type , 75 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Fire Punch has 10 % chance of putting target to burn .
Electric Type , 75 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Thunder Punch has 10 % chance of putting target to paralysis .
Fighting Type , 75 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Drain Punch inflicts damage and up to 50 % of the damage dealt to the target is restored to the user as HP .
My Bouffalant ♀ is a normal type pokemon . She is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Megahorn , Earthquake , Stone Edge and Wild Charge .
Bug Type , 120 power , 85 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Megahorn has no special effect .
Rock Type , 100 power , 80 accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . Stone Edge has an increased critical hit ratio .
Electric Type , 90 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Wild Charge makes the user receives recoil damage equal to 1 / 4 of the damage done to the target .
My Cinccino ♀ is a normal type pokemon . She is lv.80 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Giga Impact , U-turn , Dig and Aqua Tail .
Bug Type , 70 power , 100 accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . U-turn switches the user if the user not the only pokemon in the party that is able to battle .
Water Type , 90 power , 90 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Aqua Tail has no special effect .
My Fire type team contains six pokemons : Simisear , Heatmor , Flareon , Heatran , Darmanitan , and Ninetales .
My Simisear ♂ is a fire type pokemon . He is lv.78 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Shadow Claw , Fire Punch , Dig and Superpower .
My Heatmor ♂ is a fire type pokemon . He is lv.72 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Flamethrower , Heat Wave , Sunny Day and Mega Drain .
Fire Type , 95 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Flamethrower has 10 % chance of putting target to burn .
Fire Type , no power , no accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . Sunny Day makes the sunlight brighten the field . This weather will last for 5 turns , including the turn the move is used .
Grass Type , 75 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Mega Drain inflicts damage and up to 50 % of the damage dealt to the target is restored to the user as HP .
My Flareon ♂ is a fire type pokemon . He is lv.76 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Fire Fang , Dig , Giga Impact and Superpower .
Fire Type , 65 power , 95 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Fire Fang has 10 % chance of putting target to burn. It also has 10 % chance put target to flinch .
My Heatran ♀ is a fire and Steel type pokemon . She is lv.78 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Ancient Power , Heat Wave , Earth Power and Dragon Pulse .
Rock Type , 60 power , 100 accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . Ancient Power has 10 % chance of increasing user's Att , Def , Sp.Att , Sp.Def , and Spd by one stage each .
Ground Type , 90 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Earth Power has 10 % chance of decreasing target's Sp.Def by one stage .
My Darmanitan ♀ is a fire type pokemon . She is lv.77 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Superpower , Flare Blitz , U-turn and Thrash .
Fire Type , 120 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Flare Blitz makes the user receives recoil damage equal to 1 / 3 of the damage done to the target .
My Ninetales ♂ is a fire type pokemon . He is lv.83 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Heat Wave , Energy Ball , Dark Pulse and Psyshock .
Grass Type , 90 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Energy Ball has 10 % chance of decreasing target's Sp.Def by one stage .
Dark Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Dark Pulse has 20 % chance of putting target to flinch .
Psychic Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Psyshock uses the target's Defense instead of its Special Defense to calculate damage .
My Electric type team contains six pokemons : Ampharos , Magnezone , Zebstrika , Emolga , Rotom , and Eelektross .
My Ampharos ♂ is a electric type pokemon . He is lv.79 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Cotton Guard , Signal Beam , Thunder Wave and Thunderbolt .
Grass Type , no power , no accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Cotton Guard raises user's Def by three stages .
Electric Type , no power , 100 accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Thunder Wave puts the target to paralysis .
My Magnezone is a electric and steel type pokemon . It is lv.76 when entering hall of fame . And its moves are Signal Beam , Thunder Wave , Flash Cannon and Thunderbolt .
Steel Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Flash Cannon has 10 % chance of decreasing target's Sp.Def by one stage .
My Zebstrika ♂ is a electric type pokemon . He is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Flame Charge , Wild Charge , Bounce and Thunder Wave .
Fire Type , 50 power , 100 accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Flame Charge raises user's Spd by one stage .

Flying Type , 85 power , 85 accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . Bounce makes the user bounces up high on the first turn , avoiding most moves . On the second turn , the user slams down onto the target , inflicting damage with a 30 % chance of paralyzing it .
My Emolga ♂ is a electric and flying type pokemon . He is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Signal Beam , Air Slash , Thunder Wave and Thunderbolt .
My Rotom is a electric and ice type pokemon . It is lv.78 when entering hall of fame . And its moves are Thunderbolt , Dark Pulse , Shadow Ball and Blizzard .
Ice Type , 120 power , 70 accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . Blizzard has 10 % chance of putting target to freeze .
My Eelektross ♀ is a electric type pokemon . She is lv.73 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Crunch , Aqua Tail , Superpower and Dragon Claw .
Dragon Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Dragon Claw has no special effect .
My Ice type team contains six pokemons : Vanilluxe , Glaceon , Mamoswine , Cryogonal , Walrein , and Beartic .
My Vanilluxe ♀ is an ice type pokemon . She is lv.73 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Signal Beam , Ice Beam , Hail and Toxic .

Ice Type , no power , no accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Hail changes the weather to hail . This weather will last for 5 turns , including the turn the move is used . All the pokemons except ice type will take a damage equals to 1 / 16 of the max HP .
Poison Type , no power , 90 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Toxic puts target to badly poison .
My Glaceon ♀ is an ice type pokemon . She is lv.73 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Hail , Ice Shard , Shadow Ball and Ice Beam .
Ice Type , 40 power , 100 accuracy and 30 PP ( max 48 ) . Ice Shard has no special effect .
My Mamoswine ♀ is an ice and ground type pokemon . She is lv.74 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Blizzard , Stone Edge , Thrash and Earthquake .
My Cryogonal is an ice type pokemon . It is lv.72 when entering hall of fame . And its moves are Ice Beam , Hail , Light Screen and Reflect .
Psychic Type , no power , no accuracy and 30 PP ( max 48 ) . Light Screen builds a light screen . Pokemon under the protection of light screen takes half of the normal special move damage .
Psychic Type , no power , no accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Reflect builds a reflect . Pokemon under the protection of light screen takes half of the normal physical move damage .
My Walrein ♂ is an ice and water type pokemon . He is lv.72 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Ice Beam , Hail , Surf and Signal Beam .
My Beartic ♂ is an ice type pokemon . He is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Dig , Shadow Claw , Aqua Jet and Superpower .
My Fighting type team contains six pokemons : Sawk , Breloom , Throh , Virizion , Poliwrath , and Mienshao .
My Sawk ♂ is a fighting type pokemon . He is lv.74 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Stone Edge , Ice Punch , Close Combat and Earthquake .
Fighting Type , 120 power , 100 accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . Close Combat decreases the user's Def and Sp.Def by one stage each .
My Breloom ♂ is a grass and fighting type pokemon . He is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Drain Punch , Toxic , Seed Bomb and Mach Punch .
Grass Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Seed Bomb has no special effect .
Fighting Type , 40 power , 100 accuracy and 30 PP ( max 48 ) . Mach Punch has no special effect .
My Throh ♂ is a fighting type pokemon . He is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Superpower , Ice Punch , Earthquake and Stone Edge .
My Virizion is a grass and fighting pokemon . It is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And its moves are X-Scissor , Leaf Blade , Giga Drain and Sacred Sword .
Bug Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . X-Scissor has no special effect .
Grass Type , 90 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Leaf Blade has an increased critical hit ratio .

Grass Type , 75 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Giga Drain inflicts damage and up to 50 % of the damage dealt to the target is restored to the user as HP . If this attack deals 1 HP of damage , 1 HP will restored to the user .
Fighting Type , 90 power , 100 accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Sacred Sword ignores the target's Def and evasion stat stages .
My Poliwrath ♀ is a water and fighting type pokemon . She is lv.72 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Giga Impact , Ice Punch , Earthquake and Waterfall .
My Mienshao ♂ is a fighting type pokemon . He is lv.82 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are High Jump Kick , Fake Out , U-Turn and Drain Punch .
Fighting Type , 130 power , 90 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . If High Jump Kick misses or crash due to type immunity, the user receives recoil damage equal to 1 / 2 of the max HP .
Normal Type , 90 power , 100 accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Fake Out can only used in the first turn the user is out . It puts the target to flinch .
My Fighting type team contains six pokemons : Toxicroak , Drapion , Nidoking , Nidoqueen , Crobat , and Muk .
My Toxicroak ♀ is a poison and fighting type pokemon . She is lv.72 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Dual Chop , Fake Out , Drain Punch and Sucker Punch .
Dragon Type , 40 power , 90 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Dual Chop attacks twice in a single turn .

Dark Type , 80 power , 100 accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . If Sucker Punch's target has selected a physical or special attack and has not yet had a chance to execute its move , Sucker Punch will damage the target ; otherwise , Sucker Punch will fail .
My Drapion ♀ is a poison and dark type pokemon . She is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Night Slash , Crunch , X-Scissor and Earthquake .
Dark Type , 70 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Night Slash has an increased critical hit ratio .
My Nidoking ♂ is a poison and ground type pokemon . He is lv.73 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Earthquake , Stone Edge , Megahorn and Outrage .
Dragon Type , 120 power , 100 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 26 ) . Outrage inflicts damage for 2 ~ 3 turns . After finishing , the user becomes confused .
My Nidoqueen ♀ is a poison and ground pokemon . She is lv.72 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Earthquake , Shadow Claw , Stone Edge and Outrage .
My Crobat ♀ is a poison and flying type pokemon . She is lv.76 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Super Fang , Fly , X-Scissor and U-Turn .
Normal Type , change power , 90 accuracy and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Super Fang inflicts damage equals to the target's remaining HP , minimum 1 .

Flying Type , 90 power , 95 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . On the turn that Fly is selected, the user will fly up and become semi-invulnerable , where the only attacks it cannot avoid are Swift , Gust , Thunder , Whirlwind , Twister , Sky Uppercut , smack Down , Hurricane , and Sonic Boom . On the following turn, Dig will do damage .
My Muk ♀ is a poison type pokemon . She is lv.70 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Explosion , Ice Punch , Dig and Pain Split .
Normal Type , 250 power , 100 accuracy and 5 PP ( max 8 ) . Explosion inflicts damage , and causes the user to faint .

Normal Type , no power , no accuracy and 20 PP ( max 32 ) . Pain Split adds the current HP of the user and target Pokémon . It then divides this value by two and increases or decreases the HP of each Pokémon to become equal to the result ( limited by each Pokémon's maximum HP ) .
My Ground type team contains six pokemons : Hippowdon , Gliscor , Krookodile , Flygon , Excadrill , and Claydol .
My Hippowdon ♂ is a ground type pokemon . He is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Superpower , Crunch , Stone Edge and Earthquake .
My Gliscor ♂ is a ground and flysing type pokemon . He is lv.76 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Stone Edge , Night Slash , Earthquake and U-Turn .
My Krookodile ♂ is a ground and dark type pokemon . He is lv.71 when entering hall of fame . And his moves are Foul Play , Outrage , Stone Edge and Earthquake .
Dark Type , 95 power , 100 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Foul Play uses the target's Attack stat to calculate damage instead of the user's .
My Flygon ♂ is a ground and dragon pokemon . He is lv.73 when entering hall of fame . And His moves are Dragon Claw , Earthquake , U-Turn and Fly .
My Excadrill ♀ is a ground and steel type pokemon . She is lv.72 when entering hall of fame . And her moves are Shadow Claw , Aerial Ace , X-Scissor and Earthquake .
Flying Type , 60 power , no accuracy , it will always hit the target , and 10 PP ( max 16 ) . Aerial Ace has no special effect .
My Claydol is a ground and psychic type pokemon . It is lv.70 when entering hall of fame . And its moves are Explosion , Toxic , Stone Edge and Zen Headbutt .
Psychic Type , 80 power , 90 accuracy and 15 PP ( max 24 ) . Zen Headbutt has 20 % chance of putting target to flinch .
